lead_paragraph: Answers Corp [AFCVHA.UL], which owns the Answers.com and Multiply websites, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on Friday with a plan to swap ownership of the company to creditors who are owed about $540 million, according to court documents.
snippet: Answers Corp [AFCVHA.UL], which owns the Answers.com and Multiply websites, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy on Friday with a plan to swap ownership of the company to creditors who are owed about $540 million, according to court documents....

headline.main: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
headline.print_headline: 'Beauty and Beast' Gay Character Sparks Christian Boycott Calls
